policies.involuntary_refund:
Permitted when Aircalin cancels or delays a flight with 3 hours or more.
• If no portion of the ticket is used: full refund applies
• If partially used: unused sectors can be refunded
policies.involuntary_reissue:
If a schedule change results in a fare difference due to a change in class of service, routing, or carrier, the issuing agency shall consult with our team at usa@apg-ga.us for review and approval or denial.
When the schedule change does not involve a change in routing, carrier, and/or class of service, reissue all ticket coupons using the FXI/SC entry.
policies.voluntary_refund: Proceed as per fare rules associated with the ticket.
policies.medical_refund: Proceed as per fare rules associated with the ticket.
policies.name_change:
Aircalin allows name corrections subject to specific conditions:
Paid Changes (4000 XPF via EMD SERF):
• Inversion of first and middle names
• Maiden/married name change
• Adding second surname (e.g., compound names)
• Adding infant (INF)
Free Corrections:
• Inversion or correction of one to two characters
• Inversion of surname and first name
Procedure when original booking class is available:
• Cancel flights (ER, RFPAX)
• Name update
• Rebook
• Add RM: FB DUE NAME CHANGE
• Exchange the old ticket for the new one
• Issue an EMD SERF if applicable
Procedure when original class is not available:
• Send request to usa@apg-ga.us with passport copy
policies.group_booking:
Group fares are available for parties of 10 or more passengers traveling on the same dates and flights.
• Group requests must be submitted to usa@apg-ga.us
• Group booking policies, including deposit and payment terms, are subject to confirmation by the airline at the time of quote.
policies.infant_policy:
Infants under 2 years of age are eligible for up to 90% discount on adult base fares (excl. taxes) across all routes.
• Inform the airline at booking if traveling with a baby
Cradle Service:
• Babies under 10kg and 70cm may request a cradle
• Cradles must be requested at booking or at least 24h before departure via Aircalin’s sales team (not online)
In-Flight Requirements:
• Infants over 10kg or 70cm travel on the adult’s lap with a safety belt
• Each infant must be accompanied by an adult
• One adult may accompany only one infant; a second adult is required for a second infant
Infant Baggage:
• Infants are entitled to 10kg checked baggage and one stroller, cradle, or baby seat free of charge, regardless of fare class
policies.seat_request_policy:
Some fare types treat seat selection as an optional paid service.
• Seat selection is not guaranteed and may change for safety, operational, or aircraft configuration reasons
Passengers of size:
• May request a second adjacent seat
• Second seat does not provide additional baggage allowance
• Option is only available on Aircalin-operated flights and must be requested in advance
• If unavailable and passenger cannot fit in one seat, boarding may be denied and rebooking offered on a later flight
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
Aircalin does not provide a same-day void or 24-hour cancellation policy as a standard feature.
• Voluntary cancellations are handled per fare rules
• Agents are advised to review ticket conditions before purchase
